mapper.select: select q_t.q_no, q_t.title as qna_title, u_t.nickname as qna_writer, u_t.img as qna_writer_img, q_t.reg_dt as qna_reg_date, q_t.content as qna_content from qna q_t, users u_t, lecture l_t where q_t.u_no = u_t.u_no and q_t.l_no = l_t.l_no and q_t.q_no = #{q_no}

select q_t.q_no, q_t.title as qna_title, u_t.nickname as qna_writer, q_t.reg_dt as qna_reg_dt, l_t.title as lec_title from qna q_t, users u_t, lecture l_t where q_t.l_no = l_t.l_no and q_t.u_no = u_t.u_no order by q_t.reg_dt desc

select q_t.q_no, q_t.title as qna_title, u_t.nickname as qna_writer, q_t.reg_dt as qna_reg_dt, l_t.title as lec_title from qna q_t, users u_t, lecture l_t where q_t.l_no = l_t.l_no and q_t.u_no = u_t.u_no order by q_t.reg_dt desc
select count(q_no) from qna where q_no > 0
